utsendelsesLand.label: In which country will you perform work?

utsendelsePeriode.label: Assignment period
utsendelsePeriode.hjelpetekst: Enter approximate date if you don't know the exact date.

harVaertEllerSkalVaereILonnetArbeidFoerU.label: Have you been or will you be in paid employment in Norway for at least one month immediately before the posting?

aktivitetIMaanedenFoerUtsendingen.label: Describe your activity in the month before the posting
aktivitetIMaanedenFoerUtsendingen.hjelpetekst: For example studies, vacation or self-employment

skalJobbeForFlereVirksomheter.label: Will you also be self-employed or work for another employer during the posting period?

virksomheterArbeidstakerJobberForIutsend.label: Who will you work for during the posting period?
virksomheterArbeidstakerJobberForIutsend.hjelpetekst: Add Norwegian and/or foreign companies you will work for during the posting period.

erSkattepliktigTilNorgeIHeleutsendingspe.label: Are you liable to pay tax to Norway for the entire posting period?

mottarPengestotteFraAnnetEosLandEllerSve.label: Do you receive financial support from another EEA country or Switzerland?

landSomUtbetalerPengestotte.label: From which country do you receive financial support?

pengestotteSomMottasFraAndreLandBelop.label: How much money do you receive gross per month
pengestotteSomMottasFraAndreLandBelop.hjelpetekst: Enter the amount in Norwegian kroner

pengestotteSomMottasFraAndreLandBeskrive.label: What kind of financial support do you receive

skalHaMedFamiliemedlemmer.label: Do you have a spouse, partner, cohabitant or children who will accompany you?
skalHaMedFamiliemedlemmer.hjelpetekst: We ask this because we want to process applications from multiple family members simultaneously

harNorskFodselsnummerEllerDnummer.label: Does the person have a Norwegian national identity number or D-number?

harFlereOpplysningerTilSoknaden.label: Do you have any additional information for the application?

tilleggsopplysningerTilSoknad.label: Describe the additional information you have for the application

erArbeidsgiverenOffentligVirksomhet.label: Is the employer a public enterprise?
erArbeidsgiverenOffentligVirksomhet.hjelpetekst: Public enterprises are state bodies and subordinate enterprises, for example ministries and universities.

erArbeidsgiverenBemanningsEllerVikarbyra.label: Is the employer a staffing or temporary work agency?

opprettholderArbeidsgiverenVanligDrift.label: Does the employer maintain normal operations in Norway?
opprettholderArbeidsgiverenVanligDrift.hjelpetekst: By this we mean that the employer still has activity and employees working in Norway during the period.

utsendelseLand.label: To which country is the employee being sent?

arbeidstakerUtsendelsePeriode.label: Assignment period
arbeidstakerUtsendelsePeriode.hjelpetekst: Enter approximate date if you don't know the exact date.

arbeidsgiverHarOppdragILandet.label: Do you as an employer have assignments in the country where the employee will be sent?

arbeidstakerBleAnsattForUtenlandsoppdrag.label: Was the employee hired because of this foreign assignment?

arbeidstakerForblirAnsattIHelePerioden.label: Will the employee still be employed by you during the entire posting period?

arbeidstakerErstatterAnnenPerson.label: Is the employee replacing another person who was sent out to do the same work?

arbeidstakerVilJobbeForVirksomhetINorgeE.label: Will the employee work for the company in Norway after the foreign assignment?

utenlandsoppholdetsBegrunnelse.label: Why should the employee work abroad?

ansettelsesforholdBeskrivelse.label: Describe the employee's employment relationship during the posting period

forrigeArbeidstakerUtsendelsePeriode.label: Previous employee's assignment
forrigeArbeidstakerUtsendelsePeriode.hjelpetekst: Enter approximate date if you don't know the exact date.

arbeidsstedType.label: Where will the work be performed?

fastEllerVekslendeArbeidssted.label: Does the employee have a fixed place of work in this country or does it vary frequently?

beskrivelseVekslende.label: Describe where the employee will work

erHjemmekontor.label: Is the employee posted to work from home office?

typeInnretning.label: What type of installation is this?

alternativer.label: Drilling ship or other mobile installation

sokkelLand.label: Which country's continental shelf is this?

navnPaSkip.label: What is the name of the ship the employee will work on?

yrketTilArbeidstaker.label: What is the employee's occupation?
yrketTilArbeidstaker.hjelpetekst: We need information about what kind of work the employee performs on board the ship

flaggland.label: What is the flag country of the ship?

hjemmebaseLand.label: In which country does the employee have their home base during the application period?
hjemmebaseLand.hjelpetekst: By home base we mean the airport where the employee starts and ends their flights

hjemmebaseNavn.label: What is the name of the home base?

erVanligHjemmebase.label: Is this the home base the employee usually works from?

vanligHjemmebaseLand.label: In which country is the home base the employee usually works from located?

vanligHjemmebaseNavn.label: What is the name of the home base the employee usually works from?

arbeidsgiverBetalerAllLonnOgNaturaytelse.label: Do you as an employer pay all salary and any benefits in kind during the posting period?

virksomheterSomUtbetalerLonnOgNaturalyte.label: Who pays the salary and any benefits in kind?
virksomheterSomUtbetalerLonnOgNaturalyte.hjelpetekst: Add Norwegian and/or foreign companies that pay the salary and any benefits in kind

harFlereOpplysningerTilSoknaden.label: Do you have any additional information for the application?

tilleggsopplysningerTilSoknad.label: Describe the additional information you have for the application
